isis.stitle: ALTERNATOR: DELCO-REMY 26-SI SERIES - REPAIR PROCEDURES - DIODE CHECKS

svcproc.title: DIODE CHECKS
svcproc.para: Check each of the six diodes by removing each diode lead from the rectifier bridge terminal and connecting an ohmmeter using the lower range scale (Rx1 or Rx10) to the diode lead and case ( Item C, Figure 7). Then reverse the ohmmeter lead connections to the diode lead and case. If both readings are the same, the diode is bad. A good diode will give one high and one low reading.

caution.para: Do not use high voltage such as a 110 volt test lamp to check diodes.
